post.title: old lenses usage on canon rebel eos t1i?
post.content: hi there, i recently bought the canon rebel eos t1i dslr. i have recently been given some old lens that are compatible with the canon ae1 which is a manual film camera. the lens obviously don't fit the rebel but is there any kind of adapter on the market that i can buy so that these old lens will work with my new camera? thanks
